items.content_html: This is a simple React Weather App that allows users to check the current temperature and weather conditions in their current location. The app uses the SheCodesWeather API to fetch the data and display the information to the user. The app is built using React and is designed to be lightweight and easy to use.
items.title: neginashkan/React-Weather-App: This is a simple React Weather App that allows users to check the current temperature and weather conditions in their current location. The app uses the SheCodesWeather API to fetch the data and display the information to the user. The app is built using React and is designed to be lightweight and easy to use.
